subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Curtis Granderson, Robinson Cano and Hiroki Kuroda were extended qualifying contract offers of $14.1 million by the Yankees on Monday. Each has until Nov. 11 to accept or reject the offer.
snippet: Curtis Granderson, Robinson Cano and Hiroki Kuroda were extended qualifying contract offers of $14.1 million by the Yankees on Monday. Each has until Nov. 11 to accept or reject the offer.
